10 using namespace Gdiplus;

12 //
13 // Without double buffering it's flickery
14 // With double buffering it gets slow at high resolutions
15 //
16 #define USE_GDIPLUS_DOUBLE_BUFFERING
17 
18 class GWENRENDER_Windows : public Gwen::Gwen::Renderer::Base
19 {
20 public:
21 
22  GWENRENDER_Windows(HWND pHWND)
23  {
24  m_HWND = pHWND;
25  m_hDC = NULL;
26  m_iWidth = 0;
27  m_iHeight = 0;
28 #ifdef USE_GDIPLUS_DOUBLE_BUFFERING
29  m_Bitmap = NULL;
30  m_CachedBitmap = NULL;
31 #endif
32  graphics = NULL;
33  // Initialize GDI+.
34  GdiplusStartupInput gdiplusStartupInput;
35  GdiplusStartup(&m_gdiplusToken, &gdiplusStartupInput, NULL);
36  }
37 
38  ~GWENRENDER_Windows()
39  {
40 #ifdef USE_GDIPLUS_DOUBLE_BUFFERING
41  DestroyOffscreenBitmap();
42 #endif
43  GdiplusShutdown(m_gdiplusToken);
44  }
45 
46  void CreateOffscreenBitmap()
47  {
48  RECT rect;
49  GetClientRect(m_HWND, &rect);
50  int width = rect.right-rect.left;
51  int height = rect.bottom-rect.top;
52 
53  if (m_iWidth != width)
54  DestroyOffscreenBitmap();
55 
56  if (m_iHeight != height)
57  DestroyOffscreenBitmap();
58 
59 #ifdef USE_GDIPLUS_DOUBLE_BUFFERING
60 
61  if (m_Bitmap)
62  return;
63 
64  m_iWidth = width;
65  m_iHeight = height;
66  Graphics gfx(m_hDC);
67  m_Bitmap = new Bitmap(m_iWidth, m_iHeight, &gfx);
68  graphics = Graphics::FromImage(m_Bitmap);
69 #endif
70  }
71 
72  void DestroyOffscreenBitmap()
73  {
74 #ifdef USE_GDIPLUS_DOUBLE_BUFFERING
75 
76  if (m_Bitmap)
77  {
78  delete m_Bitmap; m_Bitmap = NULL;
79  }
80 
81  graphics = NULL;
82 #endif
83  }
84 
85  virtual void Begin()
86  {
87  m_hDC = BeginPaint(m_HWND, &m_PaintStruct);
88  // Create the backbuffer if it doesn't exist
89  // (or recreate if the size has changed)
90  CreateOffscreenBitmap();
91 #ifndef USE_GDIPLUS_DOUBLE_BUFFERING
92  graphics = Graphics::FromHDC(m_hDC);
93 #endif
94  }
95 
96  virtual void End()
97  {
98 #ifdef USE_GDIPLUS_DOUBLE_BUFFERING
99  Graphics gfx(m_hDC);
100  gfx.DrawImage(m_Bitmap, 0, 0);
101 #endif
102 #ifndef USE_GDIPLUS_DOUBLE_BUFFERING
103 
104  if (graphics)
105  {
106  delete graphics;
107  graphics = NULL;
108  }
109 
110 #endif
111  m_hDC = NULL;
112  EndPaint(m_HWND, &m_PaintStruct);
113  }
114 
115  virtual void DrawLine(int x, int y, int a, int b)
116  {
117  Translate(x, y);
118  Translate(a, b);
119  Pen pen(GetGDIColor(), 1.0f);
120  graphics->DrawLine(&pen, x, y, a, b);
121  }
122 
123  virtual void DrawFilledRect(Gwen::Rect rect)
124  {
125  Translate(rect);
126  SolidBrush solidBrush(GetGDIColor());
127  graphics->FillRectangle(&solidBrush, rect.x, rect.y, rect.w, rect.h);
128  }

169 
170  virtual void LoadFont(Gwen::Font* font)
171  {
172  Gwen::Debug::Msg("LOAD FONT %s\n", font->facename.c_str());
173  FontStyle fs = FontStyleRegular;
174  font->realsize = font->size*Scale();
175  Font* pFont = new Font(Gwen::Utility::StringToUnicode(
176  font->facename).c_str(), font->realsize, fs, UnitPixel, NULL);
177  font->data = pFont;
178  }
179 
180  virtual void FreeFont(Gwen::Font* pFont)
181  {
182  Gwen::Debug::Msg("FREE FONT %s\n", pFont->facename.c_str());
183 
184  if (!pFont->data)
185  return;
186 
187  Font* font = ((Font*)pFont->data);
188  delete font;
189  pFont->data = NULL;
190  }
191 
192  virtual void RenderText(Gwen::Font* pFont, Gwen::Rect rect, const Gwen::UnicodeString& text)
193  {
194  /*
195  * SetDrawColor( Gwen::Color( 255, 0, 0, 100 ) );
196  * DrawFilledRect( rect );
197  * SetDrawColor( Gwen::Color( 0, 0, 0, 255 ) );
198  */
199  Translate(rect);
200 
201  if (!pFont->data || fabs(pFont->realsize-pFont->size*Scale()) > 2)
202  {
203  FreeFont(pFont);
204  LoadFont(pFont);
205  }
206 
207  StringFormat strFormat(StringFormat::GenericDefault());
208  SolidBrush solidBrush(GetGDIColor());
209  RectF r(rect.x, rect.y, rect.w, rect.h);
210  Font* pGDIFont = (Font*)pFont->data;
211  graphics->DrawString(text.c_str(), text.length()+1, pGDIFont, r, &strFormat, &solidBrush);
212  }
213 
214  virtual Gwen::Point MeasureText(Gwen::Font* pFont, const Gwen::UnicodeString& text)
215  {
216  Gwen::Point p(32, 32);
217 
218  if (!pFont->data || fabs(pFont->realsize-pFont->size*Scale()) > 2)
219  {
220  FreeFont(pFont);
221  LoadFont(pFont);
222  }
223 
224  StringFormat strFormat(StringFormat::GenericDefault());
225  strFormat.SetFormatFlags(StringFormatFlagsMeasureTrailingSpaces|
226  strFormat.GetFormatFlags());
227  SizeF size;
228  Graphics g(m_HWND);
229  Font* pGDIFont = (Font*)pFont->data;
230  Status s = g.MeasureString(text.c_str(), -1, pGDIFont, &strFormat, &size);
231  return Gwen::Point(size.Width+1, size.Height+1);
232  }
233 
234  void StartClip()
235  {
236  const Gwen::Rect& rect = ClipRegion();
237  graphics->SetClip(Rect(rect.x*Scale(), rect.y*Scale(), rect.w*Scale(),
238  rect.h*Scale()), CombineMode::CombineModeReplace);
239  // Pen pen( Color( 100, 255, 0, 255 ) );
240  // graphics->DrawRectangle( &pen, Rect( rect.x*Scale(), rect.y*Scale(),
241  // rect.w*Scale(), rect.h*Scale() ) );
242  }
243 
244  void EndClip()
245  {
246  graphics->ResetClip();
247  }
248 
249  bool ProcessTexture(Gwen::Texture* pTexture)
250  {
251  return true;
252  }
253 
254  void DrawMissingImage(Gwen::Rect pTargetRect)
255  {
256  SetDrawColor(Gwen::Colors::Red);
257  DrawFilledRect(pTargetRect);
258  }
259 
260  void DrawTexturedRect(Gwen::Texture* pTexture, Gwen::Rect pTargetRect, float u1 = 0.0f,
261  float v1 = 0.0f, float u2 = 1.0f, float v2 = 1.0f)
262  {
263  Image* pImage = (Image*)pTexture->data;
264 
265  // Missing image, not loaded properly?
266  if (pImage->GetType() == ImageTypeUnknown)
267  return DrawMissingImage(pTargetRect);
268 
269  Translate(pTargetRect);
270  RectF TargetRect(pTargetRect.x, pTargetRect.y, pTargetRect.w, pTargetRect.h);
271 
272  if (u1 == 0.0f && v1 == 0.0f && u2 == 1.0f && v2 == 1.0f)
273  {
274  graphics->DrawImage(pImage, TargetRect);
275  return;
276  }
277 
278  float fW = pImage->GetWidth();
279  float fH = pImage->GetHeight();
280  u1 *= fW;
281  v1 *= fH;
282  u2 *= fW;
283  u2 -= u1;
284  v2 *= fH;
285  v2 -= v1;
286  graphics->DrawImage(pImage, TargetRect, u1, v1, u2, v2, UnitPixel);
287  }
288 
289  void LoadTexture(Gwen::Texture* pTexture)
290  {
291  Gwen::Debug::Msg("LOAD TEXTURE %s\n", pTexture->name.c_str());
292  Image* pImage = new Image(Gwen::Utility::StringToUnicode(pTexture->name).c_str());
293  pTexture->data = pImage;
294  pTexture->width = pImage->GetWidth();
295  pTexture->height = pImage->GetHeight();
296  }
297 
298  void FreeTexture(Gwen::Texture* pTexture)
299  {
300  Gwen::Debug::Msg("RELEASED TEXTURE %s\n", pTexture->name.c_str());
301  Image* pImage = (Image*)pTexture->data;
302 
303  if (!pImage)
304  return;
305 
306  delete pImage;
307  }
308
